title: Inquire About Material Composition
description: A customer with a wool allergy calls to ask if a specific sweater contains any wool.

tasks.description: Get the product name or item number from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent identifies the specific sweater in question.

tasks.description: Look up the product in the product information management (PIM) system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the detailed product page.

tasks.description: Check the material composition field and inform the customer that the sweater is made of '80% Cotton, 20% Polyester' and contains no wool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent provides accurate information that helps the customer make a safe purchasing decision.
